item.title: Adobe's Version Cue causing various issues -- should be removed until further notice
item.content:encoded: Over the past few days, we've noted a number of significant issues caused by Adobe's Version Cue -- a file-version manager in the Adobe Creative Suite 2 software. Among the problems:

item.title: Adobe Creative Suite 2.0 (CS2) installer fails partway through on some Intel-based Macs -- fixes

item.title: iDVD 6.0.2 (#2): Problems with Preview functionality -- possible fix
item.content:encoded: Problems with Preview functionality Several readers have reported an issue where, after iDVD 6.0.2, the application's preview function does not work properly. MacFixIt reader Becc

item.title: Xcode 2.3 released
item.content:encoded: Apple has released a significant update to its integrated Mac OS X development environment, Xcode (2.3). The new release includes overall stability and performance enhancements to the Xc
